rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming space with natural lighting and Vastu-aligned positioning.

rooms.name: Open-plan Living and Dining Area
rooms.description: Combines living room, dining area, and kitchen into one large space. Equipped with energy-efficient appliances and abundant natural light to maximize the eco-friendly design.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: A compact guest bathroom located near the entrance for convenience.

rooms.name: Main Living Area Balcony
rooms.description: An outdoor balcony attached to the living area, providing ample space and natural ventilation.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an attached balcony for relaxation and natural ventilation, aligned with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: A comfortable bedroom equipped with a spacious balcony following eco-friendly design norms.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom designed for privacy and comfort with an adjoining balcony.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Second master bedroom featuring a dedicated balcony and optimal orientation as per Vastu guidelines.

garden.description: A large garden space integrated with native landscaping to promote sustainability and natural cooling.

eco_features.description: Harness solar energy for sustainable living.
Collects rainwater for irrigation and reducing water consumption.
Minimizes heat loss/gain, optimizing energy efficiency.
